b'short ratio interest of $BCE is 7.91 at 2019-05-31 https://t.co/yt6Ljw0cRx $TU 3.35 $BT 2.86 $SJR 3.61'

b'@offroadrj So, you see that #Bell has trouble following their own internal code of conduct. Imagine how seriously they follow the #CRTC or #Competition Act? They get fined all the time, in the Millions, easy to prove $BCE has no Moral compass. Profits before People always'

b'@offroadrj We say Monopoly. NO competition, you can set prices anywhere. The CEO made 5 million a year, just retired with another 5 million bonus. $BCE the company shareholders, got rich on the backs of Canadians, and are ruthless in ripping customers off & treating their own employees bad'
